title: Yellowstone National Park: Places To Go
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go             Places To Go       Seeing Old Faithful Geyser erupt is one of the main highlights in Yellowstone National Park, but there are numerous other destinations to explore. Click the place names on the map below to learn about the unique features in each area. Visitor centers are great places to start exploring. What's on your itinerary?  If you are looking for places to see on your way to and from Yellowstone, visit our nearby attractions page for lists and links to nearby cities, parks, and museums.        Click on a name on the map to learn more about that area.                                        Place Names on the Map Mammoth Hot Springs Area Tower-Roosevelt Area Norris Area Canyon Village Area Madison and West Yellowstone Area Old Faithful Area Lake Village, Fishing Bridge, and Bridge Bay Areas Grant Village & West Thumb Areas Entrance Stations                          Along the Upper Loop Road This video takes online visitors on a tour of the Upper Loop Road to features such as hot spring terraces, geyser basins, waterfalls, and the Grand Canyon of the Yellowstone.   Duration:15 minutes
